name: The Witless
description:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/$23415

You wake up, alone, in a strange room full of puzzles that will neither challenge nor surprise you.

Team

  • Pogo / @RoloPogo
  • Commie / @xerodev

Controls

  • Move with WASD
  • Look with the Mouse
  • Interact with Left Click

Changelog

  • 0.0.0
    • Initial Release for Ludum Dare 38
    • (27/04/2017) Added Mac Build
  • 0.0.1
    • Fixed compass clue to match the correct solution
    • Moved compass clue to compass room
  • 0.0.2
    • Fixed text through wall bug introduced in 0.0.1
  • 0.1.0
    • 3 New rooms with 20 new puzzles
